column1: and that the 1st Respondent agreed to make the award on that basis. The 2nd
Respondent  has  not  taken  up  the  position  that  the  Petitioner,  through  its
payments  due  to  the  2nd  Respondent.  In  these  circumstances,  there  is  no
doubt that the Petitioner has not agreed to pay any compensation to the 2nd
Respondent, and that the award of the arbitrator is factually incorrect.
